resources.string: This event sign-up process uses a fair lottery system instead of first come, first served registration. When you join an event’s waiting list, your name will be entered into a random draw that takes place after the registration period closes. Everyone on the waiting list has an equal chance of being selected. If you’re chosen, you’ll receive a notification inviting you to confirm your spot. If you decide not to accept or don’t respond, another entrant will be randomly selected in your place. This system ensures that everyone gets a fair opportunity to participate, without the pressure of rushing to sign up first.
This event is open to all students. Bring your student ID to participate.
